Description: Fragment of an undyed plain weave with roundel (14.4 cm dia.) made of loops in purple wool; the loops (c.4mm long) are made with supplementary weft; all edges are cut and ragged; plain weave: warp-undyed linen (S/27), weft-undyed linen (S/13); supplementary weft-purple wool (S); possible furnishing
Curator's comments: includes a small bag with threads and fibres inscribed 'loose threads removed during cleaning'
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
